channel.title: Need help Blobscape is down
channel.description:
hey i need help for some unknown reason the other day no one can connect to my pc and ive tryed running it on my laptop not even that will work, im only able to log in on my pc even if i try to log in from a lan connection it still doesnt work does anyone have any ideas on how to solve this problem much will be appreciated.
also this isnt a problem with my server files ive tryed running other sources to test if it was my source that was the problem but it isnt no sources work thanks fr reading and please leave replys

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down
item.dc:creator: @blobboy blobboy
item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

like i said i have been running the server for 3 months now so i have all of them running and i dont use no ip i use hamachi instead

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Things suppose to be running while playing on the server -
1.Runserver.bat
2.No-ip porter
3.Porter
4.Hamachi(Optinal)

Make sure you have all of the above working ^^^^

Read full topic

This is rediculous[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 07:05:14 PM[/size][hr]Dude i g2g but befor i do ill try this with yah… try reseting all your wires that connect your computer. maybe somethings wrong. After you open computer it will probably work. so yeah ill be back later cya

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down

item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

nope thats not it lol cause it was working before and i had the firewall then it stopped randomly i havnt downloaded anything new at all

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

Alright…So now you say that everything is fine, but it just dosent work? Then there is a problem. Try going to control panel>security center>windows firewal>and make a new TCP Port number (43594) with ur server name. That may be the problem of why people can not connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down
item.dc:creator: @blobboy blobboy
item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

also its not on another port because i havnt made any changes and yes it doesnt let anyone to connect not even my laptop and normally when the internet is down and my laptop is connects to my pc it connects but it doesnt anymore

so i run it on my main i try to connect from laptop and doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: Need help Blobscape is down
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

1) try making ur router port fowarding make it connect to other pcs…
2) set up no-ip or hamachi cuz sometimes it is not set up
3) maybe its on another port…

Basicly your server dosent run for people who try to connect. But it works for you?

Read full topic
